actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works by unanimous consent
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works by unanimous consent.

official_title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to clarify the period of time for which unemployment assistance is available in cases of major disasters.

summary.text: Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to specify that the maximum period of time for which unemployment assistance is available in cases of major disasters is determined by reference to the date the individual became unemployed as a result of the major disaster.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to clarify the period of time for which unemployment assistance is available in cases of major disasters.
